titles.title: A Wonderful Savior Is Jesus Our Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v2 v3 v2 v4 v2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bb
A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord
A wonderful Savior to me
He hideth my soul
In the cleft of the rock
Where rivers of pleasure I see

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock
that shadows a dry thirsty land
he hideth my soul in the depths of His love
and covers me there with His hand
and covers me there with His hand

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord
He taketh my burden away
He holdeth me up
And I shall not be moved
He giveth me strength as my day

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With numberless blessings
Each moment He crowns
And filled with His fullness divine
I sing in my rapture oh glory to God
For such a Redeemer as mine

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When clothed in His brightness
Transported I rise
To meet Him in clouds of the sky
His perfect salvation
His wonderful love
I'll shout with the millions on high
